line.comment: * we first choose a template from the 9972 t file previously imported in setup.Mayhem
* NPC shipyards have 100 people and infinite resources
* we also use this variable to check if a ship is created by Mayhem
* $ship-> set override name flags: name flags= $flag rename object= [TRUE]
* get how many ships we already have in the sector and how strong they are
* $targetedSectorM1 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M1] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
* $targetedSectorM2 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M2] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
* $targetedSectorM6 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M6] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
* $targetedSectorM7 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M7] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
* $targetedSectorTM = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[TM] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
* Scales down the invasion if the player is the target.
* Mayhem 2.7.5: there's only one wave against player sectors.
* in case of broken alliances or something
* we add a safety to check for non active ships...

line.text: ' was inactive and has been recalled by '

line.comment: * ...and another one to call ships back if there is no targeted sector

sval.val: was inactive and has been recalled by
we first choose a template from the 9972 t file previously imported in setup.Mayhem
NPC shipyards have 100 people and infinite resources
we also use this variable to check if a ship is created by Mayhem
$ship-> set override name flags: name flags= $flag rename object= [TRUE]
get how many ships we already have in the sector and how strong they are
$targetedSectorM1 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M1] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
$targetedSectorM2 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M2] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
$targetedSectorM6 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M6] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
$targetedSectorM7 = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[M7] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
$targetedSectorTM = find ship: sector=$targetedSector class or type=[TM] race=[OWNER] flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=999 refpos=null
Scales down the invasion if the player is the target.
Mayhem 2.7.5: there's only one wave against player sectors.
in case of broken alliances or something
we add a safety to check for non active ships...
...and another one to call ships back if there is no targeted sector
